meanings.definition: The study and application of nanotechnology.
meanings.sent1: Nanotechs help scientists create tiny machines.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use nanotechs to explore the world at a very small scale.
meanings.sent3: The professor joked that studying nanotechs was like working with invisible tools.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nanotechs, even the smallest details matter greatly.
meanings.sent5: Learning about nanotechs is like discovering a whole new universe right under our noses.

meanings.definition: Devices or materials at the nanoscale level.
meanings.sent1: The new nanotechs revolutionized the electronics industry.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are developing advanced nanotechs for medical applications.
meanings.sent3: The tiny nanotechs seemed like something out of a science fiction movie.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry was so delicate, it looked like it was made with nanotechs.
meanings.sent5: The power of nanotechs lies in their ability to transform the ordinary into the extraordinary.
